unit.utterance: Yek zamine xeyli bozorgi bud, mesle yek bāq ke pore deraxte sib bud
unit.utterance_translation: there was a big farm or a garden full of apple trees

unit.utterance: bad yek āqāyi ke hālā nemidānam sāhebe ān bāq bud yā yek mardome ādi bud rafte bud bālāye ān deraxt
unit.utterance_translation: there was a man, whom I don't know whether he was the owner of the garden or some passerby, he went on top of the tree

unit.utterance: sibhā rā az ruye deraxt mičid va hame rā rixte bud tuye se tā az in sabadhā
unit.utterance_translation: he was picking apples and he put them all in three baskets

unit.utterance: bad harkodām ke az ādamhāye ādi az kenāre ān bāq migozašt masalan yek āqāyi masalan bā gusfand yā bozaš yā gusāleaš az kenāre u ādi gozašt
unit.utterance_translation: there were other people who were passing the man, for example another man with a goat

unit.utterance: bad yek pesarbačeyi ke bā dočarxe dāšt rad mišod češmaš in sabadhā rā gereft
unit.utterance_translation: A little boy on a bike who was passing saw the baskets

unit.utterance: bad vaqti ke nazdike in sabadhā resid did kasi kenāre in sabadhā nist did ke mardi bālāye deraxt ast
unit.utterance_translation: when he approached the baskets, he found out that nobody was there and a man was on the tree

unit.utterance: dārad sibhā rā mičinad
unit.utterance_translation: picking the apples

unit.utterance: bad yeki az in sabadhā rā bardāšt gozāšt ruye dočarxeaš az kenāre ān āqā rad šod
unit.utterance_translation: so he took one basket and put it on his bike and went away

unit.utterance: bad zamāni ke dāšt rad mišod yekho yeki digar bā dočarxe makuse u dāšt harkat mikard samtaš
unit.utterance_translation: on his way he saw somebody else on a bike coming approaching him in the opposite direction

unit.utterance: bad inqadr ke bā sorate ziad ān dustaš yā ān pesari ke bā sorate ziad dāšt harkat mikard yekdafe kolāhe ān pesari ke sibhā rā gerefte bud mioftad ruye zamin
unit.utterance_translation: because of the speed of the the other bike coming from the other side, the boy's hat just fell down

unit.utterance: bad pesar ke miravad donbāle kolāhaš az dočarxe mioftad pāyin
unit.utterance_translation: when the boy tried to capture his hat, he himself fell down

unit.utterance: vaqti ke dočarxeaš mixorad zamin az dočarxe mioftad pāyin hameye sibhāye tuye sabadaš mirizad
unit.utterance_translation: and the apples spilled out

unit.utterance: bad čand tā az pesarbačehayi ke hamseno sale xodaš budand dāštand bāzi mikardand bā rākete tennis
unit.utterance_translation: there were also a few boys of the same age who were playing with tennis rackets

unit.utterance: bad didand ke in pesar oftād zamin miravad in pesar rā komak mikonand
unit.utterance_translation: they saw the little boy fell down, and they went to help him

unit.utterance: bad tamāme sibhā rā bā hamdigar jam mikonand mirizand dāxele sabad
unit.utterance_translation: they helped him gather the pears and put them back into the basket

unit.utterance: bad pesar ke motmaen mišavad sibhā jam šode sabad rā dobāre migozārad ruye dočarxeaš dārad harkat mikonad
unit.utterance_translation: after gathering all the pears, the little boy put the basket on his bike again and he was about to leave

unit.utterance: hamān pesari ke u rā komak karde bud yekho motevajehe kolāhaš mišavad
unit.utterance_translation: a boy who helped the little boy noticed a hat on the ground

unit.utterance: motevajehe kolāhaš mišavad bad miravad ke in kolāh rā midahad be hamān pesar bad zamāni ke kolāh rā beheš midahad
unit.utterance_translation: he noticed the hat and he went to give it back to the boy, and when he returned the hat to him

unit.utterance: az sabade hamān pesar čand tā sib barmidārad, be tedāde dustānaš
unit.utterance_translation: he took a few pears from the basket for his friends

unit.utterance: bad sibhā rā midahad daste dustānaš bad hamān lahzeyi ke inhā dārand rad mišavand hamān āqāyi ke bālāye deraxt bud miāyad pāyin miravad sabadhāyaš rā mišmorad mibinad yeki az sabadhāyaš kam ast
unit.utterance_translation: he gave his friends the pears and when they were passing altogether, the man who was on the tree came down and counted his baskets and found out that one of them was gone

unit.utterance: bad hamān moqe pesarbačehā az hamān qesmati ke kenāre in āqā hast rad šodand hamān jur ke dāštand ba rāketešān bāzi mikardand engār ke sibhāyi ke dar dastešān bud tavajohe in āqā rā jalb karde bud
unit.utterance_translation: at the same time the boys were passing while playing with their racquets and the man notices the apples in their hands
